Description: Google is looking for a Senior Data Analyst to join our New York City team! The ideal candidate will have 5+ years of experience in data analysis and a strong understanding of statistics and data modeling.
Microsoft is seeking a Software Engineer to join our team in Seattle! The ideal candidate will have 3-5 years of experience in software development, with a strong background in C# and .NET.

Amazon is looking for an experienced Product Manager to join our San Francisco team! The ideal candidate will have 7+ years of experience in product management and a strong understanding of e-commerce and retail industries.

Facebook is seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to join our team in Menlo Park! The ideal candidate will have 10+ years of experience in machine learning and a strong understanding of natural language processing and computer vision.

Tesla is looking for a Senior Electrical Engineer to join our team in Fremont! The ideal candidate will have 5+ years of experience in electrical engineering and a strong understanding of power electronics and circuit design.
